RACE.RACE_TEXT: Port Washington S. BELMONT PARK RACE 1 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 90. Stakes Purse 125000. INNER TURF FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: WHATLOVELOOKSLIKE established the front shortly after the start and settled under a rating hold just off the inside conceding the front to FREEDYMO FACTOR with six and a half furlongs to run, remained attending that foe latched on to the inside, advanced steadily to take command with seven-sixteenths to run, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths when under challenge from RUNAWAY RUMOUR to the outside, swung four then three wide into upper stretch on near even terms with that rival to the outside and was leaned on straightened away, then got bumped in the hind end to be turned out but absorbed the contact inside the three-sixteenths, dug in repelling the challenge to edge clear under a drive and prevail. GOLDEN ROCKET settled tracking the front just off the inside at the tail of the compact field while in range, tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing near the quarter pole and spun just off the inside into upper stretch, ran on to secure the place honors. RUNAWAY RUMOUR three wide in pursuit, advanced three wide at the three-eighths issuing a bid to get on near even terms swinging five then four wide and leaning in on her main rival into upper stretch when let out for the drive, dug in under a drive coming in and attempting to turn out WHATLOVELOOKSLIKE inside the three-sixteenths, had the move absorbed by the top one and was rebuffed before flattening out in the late stages. FREDDYMO FACTOR broke out and was steadied at the start, ranged up three wide into the backstretch to take command and show the way under rating three wide with six and a half furlongs to run, tucked to the two path half a mile from home, got headed for the front at the seven-sixteenths, came under coaxing three furlongs out between foes, swung five to six wide into upper stretch shaken off and was eased home to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Runaway Rumour
ENTRY.COMMENT: 3w pursuit, 3w bid 3/8, 5-4w upper, rebuffed, flattened out

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Rocket
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked 2p, to ins 1/2, set down 2w 1/4p, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Freddymo Factor
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, steady st, rated 3-2w, yielded 7/16, 5-6w uppr, eased

ENTRY.NAME: Whatlovelookslike
ENTRY.COMMENT: led early, rated 2p in aim, up 7/16, 4-3w uppr, edged clear

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 2 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 83. Maiden Special Weight Purse 75000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BATTLEOFLEXINGTON dropped back under urging then settled well off the pace, rallied in the two path early on the turn, dropped to the rail while closing fast nearing the three-eighths pole then made a made inside of the pacesetter, took the advantage outside the five-sixteenths, shook clear outside the quarter-pole, came out under a right-handed crop into upper stretch, widened under urging while remaining on his inside lead to the eighth-pole, was completely geared down at that juncture, remained on his inside lead while strolling into the final sixteenth, swapped to the proper lead late then galloped home a handy winner. REFUAH was hustled from the gate, prompted the pace on the outside, chased in the three path on the turn, dropped back four wide into the stretch and proved no match for the winner while clear for the place. I'M JUST was hustled from the start, tracked the pace on the outside, chased in the four path on the turn, dropped back five wide into the stretch and tired while best of the rest. UNION TRAIL was hustled from the start, set the pace on the inside of a rival, vied in the two path on the turn, lost the lead to the winner outside the five-sixteenths then dropped back, spun three wide into the stretch and faded. GOSSIPING PANDO was hustled from the gate, climbed some while dropping back near the three-quarter pole, fell further back around the five-eighths, saved ground on the turn and faltered then was eased but walked off. BASTION dropped back while coaxed along, went around the turn in the two path and was distanced.

ENTRY.NAME: Gossiping Pando
ENTRY.OWNER: Broman Sr Chester and Broman Mary
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,drop back 3/4,climbed some,fell back5/8,ins trn,easd,wlkd

ENTRY.NAME: Union Trail
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,pace inside foe,2path turn,headed outside5/16,faded

ENTRY.NAME: Refuah
ENTRY.OWNER: Paradise Farms Corp and Walder Peter R
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,prompt outside,chased 3path turn,4p1/4,no match

ENTRY.NAME: I'm Just
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,tracked outside,chased 4path turn,5p into lane,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Battleoflexington
ENTRY.COMMENT: drp bck,settled,rallied 2p-ins turn,lead5/16,clr1/4,cantered home

ENTRY.NAME: Bastion
ENTRY.COMMENT: dropped back,coaxed along,2path turn,distanced

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 3 1 1/16M Turf CR: 103. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time OfCl aim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile and One Sixteenth on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PORTFOLIO COMPANY forwardly placed just off the inside in closest aim of the leader, advanced steadily through the far turn taking command swinging four then three wide straightened away into upper stretch set down for the drive, edged away under a drive to the finish. MASTER PIECE (CHI) settled just off the inside at the tail of the field, came under coaxing and was nudged three wide at the three-eighths by SY DOG, angled four to five wide into upper stretch, got bumped again by SY DOG straightened away, then kicked on belatedly to secure the place honors. SAFE CONDUCT coaxed from the gate, showed the way rated along the inside, remained patiently handled until under challenge nearing the quarter pole and came under coaxing nearing that station, spun three then two wide let out for the drive displaced from the front, kept on to preserve the show honors. MACKINNON pulled early on just off the inside while under restraint by the rider, tipped three wide through the far turn coming under coaxing and offering up a bid at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, stayed on one paced to the finish. ST ANTHONY tracked the pace along the inside, got let out spinning three wide into upper stretch, weakened. SY DOG saved ground near the rear of the field, tipped to the two path at the three-eighths placed to coaxing bumping MASTER PIECE three wide, swung four wide into upper stretch and came out slightly bumping MASTER PIECE straightened away but came up empty in the stretch.

ENTRY.NAME: Mackinnon
ENTRY.OWNER: ERJ Racing LLC Madaket Stables LLC and Kenney Dave
ENTRY.COMMENT: pulled early 2p, bid coaxed 3w 5/16, 4w upper, one paced

ENTRY.NAME: Sy Dog
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd near rear, bumped foe tipped 2p 3/8, 4w uppr, empty

ENTRY.NAME: St Anthony
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked inside, let out 3w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Safe Conduct
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, rated inside, let out headed 3-2w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Master Piece (CHI)
ENTRY.OWNER: Iavarone Michael Iavarone Julia C Zoumas Nicholas Baccari Dino Argano Frank and
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p at rear, nudged 3w 3/8, angled 4-5w upper, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Portfolio Company
ENTRY.COMMENT: forwardly placed 2p, took over 4-3w upper, edged away

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Kenneth L. Ramsey & Sarah K. Ramsey

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 4 6 1/2F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: FRAT PACK brushed with rivals at the start then went to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, controlled the action in the two path on the turn, responded well when asked outside the quarter-pole and drew off under a brisk hand-ride to prove much the best. MAGICO bumped with a rival at the start, tracked the pace on the outside, chased in the three path on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch and was second best. OMNI KING was well placed just off the pace, dropped back with a half-mile to run, saved ground on the turn, came out into the stretch and tired while just able to get the show. DISAPPEARANCE brushed the inside of the gate then bumped with a foe at the start, was urged along off the pace, went around the turn in the four path, came five wide into the stretch and failed to respond then just missed the show. GOLDEN PURCHASE was urged along at the rear, went five wide on the turn, came six wide into the stretch and also failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Omni King
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,dropped back 1/2,inside turn,came out 1/4,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Purchase
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,5wide turn,6wide into lane,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Frat Pack
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed brk,to front,showed way,2p turn,drew off,brisk hand ride

ENTRY.NAME: Magico
ENTRY.OWNER: Madaket Stables LLC LaPenta Robert V e Five Racing Thoroughbreds and Stonestreet
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,tracked outside,chased 3path turn,4p1/4,second best

ENTRY.NAME: Disappearance
ENTRY.COMMENT: brushed gate,bmpd,urged along,4path turn,5p1/4,no response

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 5 1 1/16M Dirt CR: 88. Starter Allowance Purse 65000. (UP TO $11,310 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $50,000 OR LESS AND WHICH HAVE NEVER WON A RACE OTHER THAN MAIDEN OR CLAIMING. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CLASSIC MARK broke out at the start bumping and pinching MISTICAL CURLIN in tandem with WARRIOR RICHARD who broke inwards and got steadied at the start, raced four wide in aim of the leader before tucking to the two path into the turn advancing to prompt the pace from the outside, came under coaxing at the three-eighths and shook away as a pair through the latter portion of the bend, angled four wide for home, dug in dueling through the stretch to the sixteenth marker, took over command at that station and edged clear to the finish kept to task. MISTICAL CURLIN got away to a rough start when stumbling at the break, then got bumped between foes who each broke his way and was pinched between them, came under coaxing to establish the front soon after and showed the way from the three path while in hand, tucked inside at the nine-sixteenths and came under intensified pressure to the outside and was placed to coaxing at the three-eighths in response, swung three wide into upper stretch, dug in knocking heads to the sixteenth marker when displaced from the front, ran on to preserve the place honors. CENTAVO chased just off the inside until tucked inside at the nine-sixteenths, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three then two wide into upper stretch and ran on to procure the show honors. INSPEIGHTOFTRAINER chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled out three to four wide into upper stretch, kept on to the finish. WARRIOR RICHARD broke in at the start bumping MISTICAL CURLIN in concert with CLASSIC MARK, then got bumped by WINNING CONNECTION, who recovered inwards from a stumble, raced forwardly placed briefly and lost action awkwardly near the one mile marker for a single stride, chased five then four wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung five wide into upper stretch and offered no rally. HANG TIGHT chased three then two wide under coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, angled three to four wide for home, made no headway. WINNING CONNECTION stumbled at the start recovering inwards and bumping WARRIOR RICHARD, chased seven paths off the inside down the backstretch and then five wide through the turn coaxed along from the seven-sixteenths, went seven wide into upper stretch and made no impact. ARREBATO four then three wide in pursuit, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Arrebato
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Centavo
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed ins 3/8, 3-2w upper, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Inspeightoftrainer
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 3/8, angled 3-4w upper, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Hang Tight
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 3-4w upper, no headway

ENTRY.NAME: Classic Mark
ENTRY.OWNER: Rice Linda and Italian Stallions Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out, steady st, 4w in aim, prompt 2p turn, 4w uppr, edged clr

ENTRY.NAME: Mistical Curlin
ENTRY.OWNER: Rodriguez Gustavo Gurdon Andrew O Poyah Anil and Vialet Roy
ENTRY.COMMENT: rough start, cut pace 3p, to ins 9/16, 3w uppr, duel str, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Warrior Richard
ENTRY.OWNER: AB Racing LLC and Crown Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk in, bumped st, lost action 1M, chased 5-4w, 5w uppr, no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Winning Connection
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, 7w backstretch, 5w turn, 7w upper, no impact

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 6 7F Turf CR: 104. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 105000. (UP TO $18,270 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Cla im Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Seven Furlongs on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HEAVEN STREET went to the front, was well rated while setting the pace in hand, vied inside on the turn, hugged the hedge while cruising into upper stretch under his own power, responded well when set down outside the furlong marker, came under a left-handed crop outside the sixteenth-pole and held under steady urging. THIN WHITE DUKE settled on the outside, was roused three then four wide on the turn, turned into upper stretch under a drive, chased the winner into the final furlong, gained on that foe into the final sixteenth and finished willingly for the show. SLIPSTREAM showed speed on the inside of a foe then was taken back off the pace, raced under restraint while rated off the pace, saved ground on the turn, was given his cue coming to the quarter-pole, moved out under a drive in upper stretch, shifted further out near the furlong marker and improved for the show. CAZADERO was reserved well behind the rest of the field, saved ground on the turn, swung five wide into the stretch and improved position with late energy but just missed the show. YES AND YES bumped with a rival while last away then was taken up in tight off heels, spotted the front a few lengths, rushed up near the three-quarter pole then tracked the pace, was roused in the two path on the turn, kept on in the stretch and just missed the superfecta. VOODOO ZIP broke a bit awkwardly then was bumped in the hindquarters, was taken in hand early then settled off the pace, saved ground while roused on the turn, came out into upper stretch and failed to rally. LUCKY CURLIN was hustled from the gate, settled off the pace, was asked in the two path on the turn then driven four wide into the stretch and came up empty. DUKE OF HAZZARD (FR) broke out and brushed the gate, was forwardly placed on the outside, ranged up three wide on the turn, made a bid with three furlongs to run, dropped back into upper stretch and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Yes and Yes
ENTRY.OWNER: Gleaves Philip A Straus Jr Joseph R and The Estate of Hugh A Fitzsimons Jr
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmp brk,takn up,rushed up,tracked,2p turn,chsd,kept on,miss super

ENTRY.NAME: Thin White Duke
ENTRY.OWNER: Gleaves Philip A Crist Steven deRegt Ken and Hilliard Bryan
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,roused 3-4w turn,gained stretch,willingly for 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Cazadero
ENTRY.COMMENT: reserved at rear,saved ground,swung 5wide 1/4,late energy

ENTRY.NAME: Slipstream
ENTRY.COMMENT: tkn back,rated inside,ask1/4,mvd out twice,improved for show

ENTRY.NAME: Voodoo Zip
ENTRY.COMMENT: bit awkward brk,bmpd,settled,ask rail turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Lucky Curlin
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled,2path turn,4wide into lane,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Heaven Street
ENTRY.COMMENT: well rated,showed way,ins turn,hugged hedge1/4,responded,held

ENTRY.NAME: Duke of Hazzard (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,brushed gate,outside,3w turn,bid3/8,faded

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 7 1 1/4M Inner turf CR: 96. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. INNER TURF (UP TO $17,400 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $62,500. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $62,500 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment D ue At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BE UP attended the leader latched on to the outside while in the two path applying little pressure save through her presence until nearing the quarter pole, came under coaxing at that juncture and issued a challenge to take command spinning just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive coming under threat to the outside through the final furlong and gamely rebuffed the threat to prevail safe on the wire. MYRISKYAFFAIR tracked the pace along the inside until tipped to the two path placed to urging at the five-sixteenths following the move by AMANI'S IMAGE in front, swung four then three wide into upper stretch, rallied to issue a challenge through the final furlong but was ultimately repelled to the finish. AMANI'S IMAGE tracked the pace along the inside until tipped to the two path placed to coaxing at the five-sixteenths, continued just off the inside into upper stretch and kept on to secure the show honors. PEACE SEEKER coaxed from the gate, tracked the pace just off the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened. ARINA (GER) established the front and showed the way rated on the pace along the inside joined by BE UP latched on to the outside by facing little pressure, had that rival intensify the pressure just inside the five-sixteenths and came under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch displaced from the front, then weakened through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Arina (GER)
ENTRY.COMMENT: rated on pace ins, coaxed near 1/4, yielded ins 1/4, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Amani's Image
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, tipped 2p coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, kept on

ENTRY.NAME: Be Up
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J and Carney Christopher L
ENTRY.COMMENT: attended 2p, coaxed near 1/4, up 2w 1/4p, dug in, gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Myriskyaffair
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked ins, tip 2p urged 5/16, 4-3w upper, rallied, repelled

ENTRY.NAME: Peace Seeker
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, tracked 2p, coaxed 3/8, 3w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 89. Claiming Purse 62000. (UP TO $10,788 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES FOUR YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $32,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $25,000 Or Less Not Considered I n Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: I'M BUZZY bumped with a rival at the start, was carried in early then bumped with a foe, settled off the pace, was taken in hand while off heels leaving the backstretch, went three then four wide on the turn, was roused outside the five-sixteenths, came five wide into the stretch, rallied outside into the final furlong and closed strongly to get up in the final stride. ICY STARE DOWN pressed the pace down the backstretch, was eased back off the pace near the nine-sixteenths, stalked three then four wide on the turn, was asked at the quarter-pole, rallied to the lead in upper stretch, led under a left-handed crop into the final sixteenth but was denied in the final stride while clear for the place. AWESOME INDRA was hustled from the gate, showed speed from the outside then set the pace, vied in the four then three path on the turn, was asked near the quarter-pole, lost the advantage to the runner-up in upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and was outfinished while clear for the show. CUSTOMEREXPERIENCE was coaxed along on the outside, went four then five wide while asked for more on the turn, chased under a drive into the final furlong and came up empty. DIVA BANKER was hustled from the start then bumped early, raced off the pace under urging, went two then three wide on the turn, spun four wide into the stretch and capitulated. BEAUTIFUL KAREN bumped with a rival at the start, angled in quickly in the early going, raced just off the pace, was given her cue in the two path on the turn and also came up empty. MON PETIT CHOU broke a bit slow then was hustled, saved ground on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Diva Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,bmpd early,urged,2-3p turn,4p1/4,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Mon Petit Chou
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,hustled,urged,inside turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Awesome Indra
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,speed,pace,4-3path turn,headed3/16,outfinished,clr3rd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 9 6F Turf CR: 91. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non -winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs. (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Six Furlongs on the Main Track.).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: KING MOONRACER four to five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked to the two path into the turn and then made his way along the hedge inside the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch, tipped out to the two path three-sixteenths from home, rallied to collar the front inside the eighth pole, then drew clear to the finish to score. ORTUS chased just off the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, angled four to five wide into upper stretch and kicked on belatedly to secure the place honors. BE THE BOSS broke out hitting the off side stall and then bumping BE OF COURAGE in tandem with EDDIE THE GREAT, showed the way in hand just off the inside until tucked inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, dug in under threat and was caught inside the eighth pole, kept on to preserve the show honors on the wire. FEATHERS ROAD chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, improved position to the finish. KREESA five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, swung four wide into upper stretch and passed tired rivals. DR. SETTLE'S DREAM five paths off the inside down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung three wide into upper stretch and weakened in the late stages. FACTUALLY CORRECT chased three wide until tucked inside half a mile from home, got coaxed along at the three-eighths, spun three then two wide into upper stretch and came up empty. BE OF COURAGE got bumped between foes at the start who each came his way, chased three then two wide under coaxing from three furlongs out, cornered three wide into upper stretch and offered no rally. EDDIE THE GREAT broke in at the start bumping BE OF COURAGE in concert with BE THE BOSS, chased along the inside under coaxing from the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no response. GOLDEN ARM broke out at the start and bobbled, chased three then two wide in closest aim of the leader coaxed along from the three-eighths, spun two to three wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Ortus
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed along 3/8, angled 4-5w upper, belatedly

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT PARK RACE 10 1 1/4M Inner turf CR: 95. Allowance Purse 95000. INNER TURF (UP TO $16,530 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. No n-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 27 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HIGHLAND GRACE dropped in while taken in hand early, moved from the rail to the three path on the first turn, settled outside on the backstretch, was roused three wide on the far turn, swung five wide into the stretch, moved further out inside the three-sixteenths, rallied outside into the final furlong and closed strongly to get up late. SISTER BRIDGET (IRE) quickly sped clear while well out in the course, dropped in entering the first turn, showed the way on the inside, responded well when asked on the far turn, came under the crop in upper stretch, fended off a rival while still in front into the final sixteenth but was overtaken while able to get the place in a good effort. PEGS A. K. GIRL went three wide on the first turn, moved closer early on the backstretch, tracked the pace on the outside, was given her cue in the three path on the far turn, came four wide into the stretch, gained to make a bid inside the three-sixteenths, battled with the runner-up into the final sixteenth and was outfinished while just able to get the show. OUT OF SIGHT brushed with a foe at the start, was hard held while keen against the rail going around the first turn, raced towards the front while rated, drafted behind horses while inside on the far turn, was asked at the quarter-pole, chased under a drive in the stretch and was out-kicked then just missed the show. ANATOLIAN went three wide on the first turn, settled off the pace, was asked in the three path while moving closer on the far turn then driven four wide into the stretch, pursued the leaders into the final furlong and was also out-kicked then just missed the superfecta. OLKOVSKHA (FR) was last to commence then taken in hand early, brushed with a foe into the first turn, went two to three wide on that bend, settled towards the rear, was roused three wide on the far turn, swung six wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. RHOMBIQUE brushed with an opponent into the first turn then was taken up while eager off heels, saved ground on that bend, was reserved on the inside, swung four wide into the stretch, moved further out inside the three-sixteenths and lacked the needed response. SWOOP TO FINISH was hard held between foes in the two path through the first turn then rated off the pace, traveled three wide while let out on the far turn, spun five wide into the stretch and also lacked the needed response. LULLABY LAND broke out and brushed with a rival, was taken under a tight hold while coming inward early, went two to three wide on the turns and was no factor. MARIAH'S FORTUNE rounded the first turn in the two path, moved closer near the seven-eighths pole then stalked the leader, was asked in the two path on the far turn.
